short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the Twitter back to being a bird.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin restores the Twitter Logo in the tab icon and on the dashboard. If you prefer how Twitter looked before it turned to X, please consider installing it.

The Twitter logo has not been restored in other places than the two mentioned above, but future updates may fix that as well.
